title: Tristan's Woman
description: Tristan's WomanBeverly HavlirA half-breed and a pariah, exotic dancer Ava Summerlin dreams of leaving Pleasure Planet and finding a new home elsewhere.Tristan, Commander of The Destroyer, is a Cyborg in search of his long lost people. He desires Ava from the moment he first sees her. But on Pleasure Planet, a half-breed is forbidden from having sexual encounters with anyone.But Tristan's lust will not be denied. He wants Ava and he will have her. However, everything will change when he discovers her true identity...Publisher's Note: Originally available in the Ellora's Cave anthology Pleasure Planet.
author: Beverly Havlir
